courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Associate (CSWA)
courses.description: Entry-level course focused on core 3D modeling, assemblies, and basic engineering drawings.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Professional (CSWP)
courses.description: Advanced modeling course emphasizing complex parts, assemblies, configurations, and design intent.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Sheet Metal Professional (CSWP-SM)
courses.description: Specialized training in sheet metal design, flat patterns, bend calculations, and manufacturing-ready models.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Weldments Professional (CSWP-WD)
courses.description: Professional-level course covering structural weldment design, cut lists, and fabrication drawings.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Surfacing Professional (CSWP-SU)
courses.description: Advanced surfacing course for creating complex, aesthetic, and free-form industrial designs.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Drawing Tools Professional (CSWP-DT)
courses.description: In-depth training on professional drawing creation, GD&T, annotations, and detailing standards.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Mold Making Professional (CSWP-MM)
courses.description: Specialized course focused on plastic part design, mold tools, core-cavity creation, and manufacturability.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAD Design Expert (CSWE)
courses.description: Expert-level certification course demonstrating mastery of advanced SOLIDWORKS design techniques.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS Simulation Associate (CSWA-S)
courses.description: Introduction to structural simulation concepts, basic stress analysis, and result interpretation.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS Simulation Professional (CSWP-S)
courses.description: Advanced simulation training covering nonlinear studies, contacts, and real-world load conditions.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS Simulation Expert (CSWE-S)
courses.description: Expert-level simulation course focused on complex analyses, validation, and engineering decision-making.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS Flow Simulation Professional (CSWP-Flow)
courses.description: Professional CFD course for analyzing fluid flow, heat transfer, and real-world thermal performance.

courses.title: SOLIDWORKS CAM Professional (CSWP-CAM)
courses.description: Advanced manufacturing course covering CNC machining, toolpath strategies, and production optimization.

courses.title: 3D Printing
courses.description: Learn end-to-end 3D printingâ€”from design optimization to slicing, materials, and real-world production applications.
